content: अनृच्-च {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [न. ब.] {@--1@} Without a hymn, not containing a verse from the Ṛgveda; अनृक् साम <ls>P. V. 4. 74</ls> <ls>Sk.</ls> {@--2@} [नास्ति ऋक् अभ्यस्ततया यस्य अच् समासः] Not conversant with, not studying, the Ṛgveda; one not invested with the sacred thread and hence not yet entitled to study the Vedas (as a boy); यथा चाज्ञेऽ फलं दानं तथा विप्रोऽनृचोऽफलः <ls>Ms. 2. 158</ls>; अनृचो माणवकः <ls>Mugdha.</ls> (In this case the form should properly be अनृच; अनृचबह्वृचावध्येतर्येव <ls>Sk.</ls>; but sometimes अनृच् also in the same sense; <ab>cf.</ab> तथाऽ नृचे हविर्दत्वा न दाता लभते फलं <ls>Ms. 3. 142</ls>; सहस्रं हि सहस्राणामनृचां यत्र भुंजते <ls n="Ms. 3.">131</ls>); अनृक्क also in the same sense.
